name: Stop Daydreaming!!
description:
Controls:

  • Left : K, A, 1
  • Right: D, 3
  • Attack: SPACE, SHIFT
  • Mouse in the middle is straight forward
  • Mouse left/right steer the car in the direction

Test your hand eye coordination by controlling the hero inside of your daydream while simultaneously having to steer your car through the traffic.

If you liked or hated my game a comment/like/follow would be really apperectiated :) !!
